reviews.sentence: Excellent value all things considered. Close to everything. No coffee maker in the room.
Enjoyable and comforting. The staff was excellent and accommodating for all request. It was clean and the room was niceno elevator.

An Avalon Classic. Location was great. Loved that it was a really old Avalon hotel. With that comes the lack of modern amenities. Bathroom fixtures were pretty dated and in need of repair. The bathroom in my parents room was silly small.

Not bad. The bed was comfrotable. AC worked really well in the room. It was very close less than half a mile to the ferry landing so it made it easy to get there after we landed on the island. Right near the pier and restaurants bars. can not complain and would stay here again. The inside of the building can use some renovations love. it is very old and smells very worn old dusty in the hallways. No elevator we were on the 3rd floor and had to climb stairs multiple times. Exhausting after you have been walking around in humidity and drinking p.

we will be back. King bed and pillows great. Glad to have air conditioner. Big room. Also being in back of building made for a quieter nite. Hot cold water hard to regulate. Water pressure poor. Need more counter space in bathroom. Also need drawers or closet to put clothes.

Clean close to everything friendly. Small room fair price clean and comfortable. I do wish they had a small fridge though Front desk did not answer when I called from the room however I called the room service number instead and they responded and attended to my request overall great experience.
Best Value in Avalon. Best value rooms have been recently renovated.

Excellent. Location was ideal. Room was ready when we checked in. Everything was clean and neat. Hated the rude noisy guests who were loud and raucous at 130 in the morning outside of our room. Also the carbon monoxide detector chirped about every 30 seconds right outside the door.
Great experience. Second time staying here. Great experience both times.
Good location. Convenient to everything. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was a nice size and beds were very comfortable.
Very uncomfortable situation. It was not to crowded. Upon arrival we received our room keys. We went to our room opened the door and the room was occupied. Very uncomfortable walking in on people.

The hotel was clean and the staff was extremely helpful and friendly. Although at busy times they were understaffed. The room was small especially the bathroom and shower. There is no shelf or counter to place toiletries. The walls are paper thin and we could hear every bump and noise made by our upstairs neighbors until 3 am on one night. Overall experience was fine but if you want luxury on Catalina I expect you have to pay more for it than the price for this hotel.
Spring Break Stay. The customer service was great and the morning breakfast sticky bun was delicious overall a great experience thank you.
Been going to this hotel for years. Friendly and supportive staff.

Great family hotel. great location. The staff was awesome. Everyone was friendly. Though our room was not ready by 3 the staff accommodated us by getting us a better room at no extra cost. Great customer service. Shout out to the staff helping with luggage. extremely friendly. Made our trip pleasurable. Thank you.

Overpriced. Location good Location and time with family and friends. Was clean but bathroom still had mold in parts of it. Price very overpriced for the available amenities and room no fridge microwave counter space etc. noise from bar across the way was too loud sounded like there was a crowd outside our window partying kept us awake windows were closed. Light shined in no curtains to filter out light. Did not rest well with the noise and could not sleep past 5306 due to light and back hurting from bed. Disappointed. Seemed short staffed.

Best value in Avalon as long as a small bathroom is ok with you. The location is phenomenal. Right in the heart of Avalon. The room was extremely large It appeared to be much larger room than the rest. I love that the bedding is clean and white. The pillows were very comfortable too. We will stay here again when we return because it is hard to find a hotel under 300 a night on Catalina. The bathroom was extremely small. I mean literally like 3 ft by 3 ft. I did not expect a huge bathroom but it was almost funny how huge our room was with such a tiny bathroom. The shower was so small my sister in law banged her head on the water knob in an attempt to shave her legs. We found later that there are larger bathrooms down the hall but they were only open intermittently.

Clean comfy convenient friendly. Wonderful stay. Front desk crew was so friendly and accommodating. Close to everything and the light breakfast was a nice touch. Rooms a bit dated but they were clean and bed was very comfortable. Would stay here again.

Positive stay small room but it was just right for a couple. I really liked how they provided vouchers for free breakfast and meal discounts. The beds were very comfortable and the bathroom was clean. Everything was walking distance from the hotel. Overall I had a positive stay. I would have liked to have a hairdryer in the bathroom though.

Great staff hotel room just ok. The hotel is in a great location and the staff is GREATYou do need to know that some rooms Including ours DO NOT have dressers OR closets. This was an inconvienience as we then had to live out our our suitcases. Also the shower was truly 2 12 feet by 2 12 feet really cramped. Also beware that the FREE BREAKFAST they offer you is actually a muffin begal or toast along with small drink at bakery next door. We actually went out for a bigger breakfast so be aware that if you want a sit down breakfast the upgrade for to Breakfast included is not worth paying for.
Beautifully renovated. Rooms are small but comfortable. Coffee in room would be nice.
Looking forward to my next stay at Atwater. The staff were extremely courteous and very helpful. A few chairs in the room would have helped.
Wonderful. Place felt like a home away from home.

You NEED to book this place. An amazing hotel. I ca n’t imagine a better place to be on the island. The hotel has been refurbished and looks amazing. We went at Christmas time and the lobby was completely decorated for the holidays. They really paid attention to the small things. For example they have a variety of games to play in the lobby a complimentary happy hour and a very friendly staff. From the moment we arrived we were over the moon about the place. I would n’t stay anywhere else.

You NEED to book this place. An amazing hotel. I ca n’t imagine a better place to be on the island. The hotel has been refurbished and looks amazing. We went at Christmas time and the lobby was completely decorated for the holidays. They really paid attention to the small things. For example they have a variety of games to play in the lobby a complimentary happy hour and a very friendly staff. From the moment we arrived we were over the moon about the place. I would n’t stay anywhere else.

Excellent Trip. We absolutely LOVED this newly renovated boutique hotel original from the 1920s. The history is fascinating. Central location makes it easy to see the sights. Our bed and linens were so comfy the room was super clean and everything was new. The staff was amazing friendly helpful happy to accommodate with luggage transportation from the ferry and storage on the day of check out. They also booked several tours for us do not miss the Bison expedition Casino tour and Avalon Food tour. you will not regret any of them. Happy hour was exceptional with several wine options delicious hors doeuvres and fabulous ambiance in the lobby. Breakfast was located just around the corner at the Avalon Grille. Fresh coffee homemade pastries REAL eggs bacon sausage fresh fruit the BEST homemade salsa. it was all excellent. Better than average for a hotel breakfast and the restaurant is beautiful with water views. We loved our time in Avalon and would definitely choose to stay at Hotel Atwater next timeNothing could have been better. would not change a thing.

Cute Nice Amenities and Staff Dusty. It looked newly remodeled and was really cute but the room was crazy dusty. I suspect it had n’t been used in a while. So that first night I suffered with coughing and itchiness. I opened the windows and left them open all the next day which really helped. The rooms are very small so even though I had a queen bed it would have been a bit cramped for 2 people. The staff was super nice and accommodating and the free breakfast was nice. The location was great not far from the boat landing and right in the middle of town. Some rooms have kind of a view where you can distantly see the ocean over rooftops see pic and some just sit across from other rooms so you have no view at all. If you want a real ocean view suite they do n’t have very many of them. Also if you book through a third party you ca n’t change the room type you have or upgrade. They also offer a discount for activities through specific vendors so check those out before you book anything.

Cute Nice Amenities and Staff Dusty. It looked newly remodeled and was really cute but the room was crazy dusty. I suspect it had n’t been used in a while. So that first night I suffered with coughing and itchiness. I opened the windows and left them open all the next day which really helped. The rooms are very small so even though I had a queen bed it would have been a bit cramped for 2 people. The staff was super nice and accommodating and the free breakfast was nice. The location was great not far from the boat landing and right in the middle of town. Some rooms have kind of a view where you can distantly see the ocean over rooftops see pic and some just sit across from other rooms so you have no view at all. If you want a real ocean view suite they do n’t have very many of them. Also if you book through a third party you ca n’t change the room type you have or upgrade. They also offer a discount for activities through specific vendors so check those out before you book anything.
Exceptional. Nice firm beds beautiful hotel staff was nice and the location was close to the beach. Will definitely stay here again. The rooms were a little small but manageable.

Exceptional. From the moment I arrived I was blown away. Beautiful. Everything was well thought out. Someone paid close attention to details. The elevator was very smooth. The room was comfortable and fantastic. Kudos. The value was perfect. I like that you included a very nice tasteful breakfast Casino tour bike options cocktail. Location was closed to everything. The staff was very helpful and nice. I will be back. Thank you for the wonderful experience. Rom door slams hard that you hear otherShower drain does not drain fast so your in a puddle.
